channel.title: writing on Hido
channel.description: Recent content in writing on Hido

item.title: Back to writing, hopefully this time more often
item.description: I have not written a blog post since long time. Actually the previous post was written on 22.06.2023. That does not mean I have not written anything though. In the meantime, I have published few posts on Linkedin, mostly on the communication of my weekend hustles, certificate achievements, and sometimes commenting on the posts I have read online. I also have written quite a lot at my work as a Product Manager.
